document_data.mainbody:
Shevarashs infravision was a spell used by clerics of Shevarash.
This spell gave the caster or targeted creature the ability to see clearly in normal darkness without any light. The maximum distance one could see clearly was . A downside of this spell was that, while it was in effect, bright sources of light, such as lanterns and torches, could temporarily blind the recipient. This spell was unable to detect invisible creatures.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required material components, the holy symbol of Shevarash and a pinch of dried carrot. A single agate was also an acceptable material component.
